description: A known fault with a flap motor was intentionally deferred by maintenance supervision to meet operational demand, directly leading to an in-flight failure.

telemetry_events.description: The known faulty left flap motor fails completely upon selection.

maintenance_logs.report: Engineering Team B recommends in-depth inspection of left flap drive motor.
maintenance_logs.action: SHIFT SUPERVISOR DECISION: Defer maintenance action to ensure aircraft availability for weekend schedule. Action scheduled for Tuesday.

transcript.speaker: FO
transcript.dialogue: Flap system fault. Okay, ECAM actions.

transcript.speaker: CPT
transcript.dialogue: It finally failed. I saw that in the logbook.
